title: r/Idontworkherelady I Got a Mega-Karen ARRESTED!
description:
r/Idontworkherelady In today's video, an entitled Karen slaps a cashier in front of OP, and then Karen gets the incredibly bright idea to go find a police officer to arrest the cashier. When the cops show up, OP pulls a reverse Uno and tells the cops what REALLY happened, and so they slap the Karen in cuffs and haul her away! Instant justice! If you like this video and want to see more, hit that subscribe button!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8nyyHu7QGo8
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
